title: Why are the new rpg style skins all ready unavailable?
body: I don't know if I just have some kind of client bug but for me, Lionheart Braum, Ryze Whitebeard, Gragas Caskbreaker and Varus Swiftbolt are all ready unavailable on my client. Is this a bug and if it's not, why are these skins all ready unavailable? Why was the opening to buy them only a few weeks?

replies.body:
Hey Monolith,

Those skins are currently visible on the client, but are not yet available for purchase yet. They've been announced to be released sometime in Patch 5.23, so stay tuned! 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-523-notes#patch-upcoming-skins
